data.chText: 作为对你提出的查询的答复…
我的广告宣传有了令人鼓舞的回应。
data.enText: I received an encouraging response to my advertisement.
a reaction to sth that has happened or been said

data.chText: 这条消息引起了人们的愤怒。
data.enText: The news provoked an angry response.

data.chText: 我敲了门，可是没有回应。
data.enText: I knocked on the door but there was no response.

data.chText: 这种产品是为了满足顾客的需要而开发的。
data.enText: The product was developed in response to customer demand.

data.chText: 我们寄出了1 000多封信，但回信寥寥。
data.enText: We sent out over 1 000 letters but the response rate has been low (= few people replied) .

data.chText: （礼拜仪式中的）答唱咏，启应经
data.enText: a part of a church service that the people sing or speak as an answer to the part that the priest sings or speaks

simple_means.memory_skill: re 回 + spons 承诺；约定 + e，respond 的名词 → 回答；答应

means: (礼拜仪式中的)答唱咏，启应经

ex.chText: 该评论员批评了政府对石油危机的反应。
ex.enText: The commentator criticized the government's reaction to the oil crisis.

ex.chText: 这一政策引起了工人们的愤怒。
ex.enText: The policy produced an angry reaction from workers.

synonyms.bx: 指对发生的事情或他人的话语所作的反应，常后接介词 to。

ex.chText: 请尽量给每个作品提点反馈意见。
ex.enText: Please try to give each piece of work some feedback.

ex.chText: 他们对我的工作提出了一些意见。
ex.enText: They gave me some feedback on my work.

synonyms.bx: 指针对某事物给出的建议、批评等，常后接介词 on。

ex.chText: 她敲了敲门，但是没人应声。
ex.enText: She knocked on the door, but there was no reply.

ex.chText: 他们的信还没有收到任何回复。
ex.enText: No reply to their letter has been received.

synonyms.bx: 指通过言语、信件等对某事作的回应，常后接介词 to。

ex.chText: 她儿子没有回答，继续看电影。
ex.enText: Her son made no response, and went on with his movie.

ex.chText: 我现写信回复您的询问。
ex.enText: I am writing in response to your inquiry.

ex.chText: 这部小说得到读者的好评。
ex.enText: This novel has received a positive response from readers.

synonyms.bx: 指口头或书面的答复，也指对某事的反应，常后接介词 to。

tr: a bodily process occurring due to the effect of some antecedent stimulus or agent
example: a bad reaction to the medicine
his responses have slowed with age

tr: the manner in which an electrical or mechanical device responds to an input signal or a range of input signals
a phrase recited or sung by the congregation following a versicle by the priest or minister
the manner in which something is greeted
example: she did not expect the cold reception she received from her superiors

tr: a statement (either spoken or written) that is made to reply to a question or request or criticism or accusation
example: I waited several days for his answer
he wrote replies to several of his critics

tr: the speech act of continuing a conversational exchange

example: this situation developed in response to events in Africa

value.def: Your response to an event or to something that is said is your reply or reaction to it.

example.ex: There has been no response to his remarks from the government...
example.tran: 政府尚未对他的言论作出回应。

example.ex: Your positive response will reinforce her actions...
example.tran: 你积极的回应会使她的行为更加坚定。

example.ex: The meeting was called in response to a request from Venezuela.
example.tran: 应委内瑞拉的要求召开了这次会议。

trans: 作为回应；作为回答
动态响应；动力特性
反应时间；响应时间
频率响应；录放幅频响应
緊急應變；应急响应；紧急响应；应急反应；应急
迅速的反应；快速回应
地震响应
免疫应答(机体对抗原的应答)
（小惯性仪器）快速反应；速动；快响应
快速反应；快速响应；快速回应；快反应；快速应对
脉冲响应
响应曲面；响应面；反应面；效应面；响应面分析
反应速度；响应速度；反映速度
瞬态响应；暂态响应；瞬时响应；暂态反应；瞬变响应
响应函数；反应函数；反应功能；响应曲线；反应机能
反应谱；反应谱分析；响应谱；响应谱分析；响应频谱
肯定回应；正响应
准备程度和应对机制；响应部分；响应系统；反应系统；应答系统
无响应；无应答；无反应；没有反应；没有响应
压力反应；壓力反應；胁迫应答；应激反应；应急反应

partsOfSpeech.dec: cor 共同 + respond 回答；反应 → 承诺保持一致 → 协调；通信
cor 共同 + respond 回答；反应 + ence 表行为，correspond的名词 → 通信；来往
de 取消 + spond 承诺；约定 → 取消约定 →〔感到〕丧气
de 取消 + spond 承诺，约定 + ent，despond 的形容词 → 失望的
re 回 + spond 承诺；约定 → 回应 → 回答
re 回 + spons 承诺；约定 + e，respond 的名词 → 回答；答应
respond 回答；反应 + ent 表人 → 回答原告的人 → 被告
respons〔e〕回答；答应 + ible …的 → 需要回应的 → 有责任的
spont〔= spond〕承诺；约定 + aneous 有…特征的 → 发自〔内心〕的承诺 → 自愿的
